profile_summary:
As a Senior Sales Engineer with a solid foundation in **Technical Solutions** and **Project Management**, I leverage 8 years of experience in the tech industry. My proficiency in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and my extensive knowledge of **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** enable me to effectively present and demonstrate complex technical solutions to clients. I excel in **Customer Relationship Management** and building client relationships, combining my technical skills with strong **Presentation Skills** and **Collaboration**. 

I am adept in high-performance solution development, particularly in healthcare and financial sectors, with hands-on experience in cloud environments such as **Azure** and **AWS**. I bring a strong understanding of compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, paired with a keen attention to detail for robust application design. Additionally, my ability to solve problems and take initiative is complemented by my proficiency in both **English** and **German**, allowing for effective communication in diverse environments.
